title: AWS AppSync to Amazon API Gateway to DynamoDB
description: Using AppSync GraphQL API to access Amazon API Gateway REST API protected with AWS_IAM auth and integrated with Amazon DynamoDB

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys an AWS AppSync GraphQL API which acts as a front door to Amazon API Gateway REST API protected with AWS_IAM authentication. The REST API Gateway is directly integrated with Amazon DynamoDB table and has capability to read/create/update/delete restaurant data in the table

bullets.text: Using Amazon API Gateway as a proxy for DynamoDB

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
